name: uninformed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not knowing much or having much information about something: For a journalist, he seems surprisingly uninformed about what is happening in the news. Synonyms
benighted literary
clueless informal
ignorant
illiterate
unenlightenedOpposite

the uninformed
people who do not have much information or knowledge about something: Individuals with knowledge must attempt to educate the uninformed.
